title: Sunset Crater Volcano National Monument: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons        From winter snow to spring flowers in Bonito Meadow, every season has something to discover.      Scenic Drive and Trails  The scenic drive is open year round, day and night. All trails in the monument are open from sunrise to sunset.  The Visitor Center The Sunset Crater Volcano Visitor Center is open all year, except December 25.   Seasonal Hours of Operation  November–June — 9:00 AM until 5:00 PM MSTJune–October — 8:00 AM until 5:00 PM MST NOTE: Most of Arizona does not observe Daylight Savings Time. We stay on Mountain Standard Time year-round.
